snippet: In 1906, the First Church Disciples of Christ expelled Elizabeth B. Grannis from its membership rolls. This month, its successor body, the Park Avenue Christian Church, welcomed her back posthumously - acknowledging a long-ago mistake.
abstract: In 1906, the First Church Disciples of Christ expelled Elizabeth B. Grannis from its membership rolls. This month, its successor body, the Park Avenue Christian Church, welcomed her back posthumously - acknowledging a long-ago mistake.

headline.main: A Crusading Suffragist Is Restored to Church Membership
headline.print_headline: 86 Years After Her Death, a Church Exile’s Work Is Vindicated
